page.description: Adds an HTTP header to the current response.
page.syntax: Context.Response.AppendHeader as V (Name as C, Value as C)

argument.name: Name as C
argument.description: The name of the HTTP header item.

argument.name: Value as C
argument.description: The value of the HTTP header item.

page.discussion: Context.Response.AppendHeader(Name, Value) adds an HTTP header to the current response.
